In contacts details page or call history details page,dial the number automatically after pick up the phone to your ear.

Take the phone to your face so it will answer the incoming call automatically
Flip back the phone to pause the on-going alarm
Keep touching the icon on the screen, flip rotary phone so the icon will scroll to the following screens and you can easily stop at the one you like by taking the phone in normal position
In the message content page, contact details page or the call history details page, dial the number automatically by pick up the phone to your ear.
Take the phone to your ear to answer automatically
Flip back the phone to pause an on-going alarm
Touch the icon, slope phone to switch to another screen
Answer or refuse the call by moving your hand up or down above the sensor
Go to the next or previous picture by moving your hand right or left above the sensor
Control the progress of a video by moving your hand right or left above the sensor. This function requires the use of the camera.
Ongoing videos will pause when the device detects that you are facing away from the screen. This function requires the use of the camera.
Control video volume by moving your hand up or down above the sensor
Incoming screen, move your hand down to answer, or move down to refuse.
When viewing a picture, swipe left or right to view previous/next one. Or keeping your hand for 1 second after swiping, will slide the picure automatically.
When playing a video, move your hand left or right to control video progress
When playing a video, move your hand up or down to control the volume
When watching a video, turn your face away from the screen to pause the video, and turn it back to continue playing
When browsing photos, you can delete them using the pinching gesture
On the desktop through gestures, delete and open the recent applications of choice
Double-click screen to wake up screen from sleep mode
When viewing pictures, pinching and moving to the left, will delete the picture.

When the desktop will open in response to a gesture, the interface will display recent tasks. You can move forward/ backward using the left and right sliding gestures, you can remove tasks using the upward sliding gesture and use the pinching gesture to enter an application.
When the screen is in sleep mode, quickly double tap to wake up the phone
When viewing an image, switch to the next one by rapidly waving your palm.
Wave your palm from left/right slowly over the top of the phone to view the privious/next image.
When playing a video, pause/play and control volume by waving your palm
Wave your palm left/right slowly over the top of the phone to play/pause the video. Wave your palm up/down to control the volume.

Help us to improve our products and services

string.name: user_experience_note_2
string.b: You will support us in improving our product and service

resources.string: 1. Participating in this program will not affect your usage of our product and service. " Participating in this program will not disturb or stop your application (For example creating pop up windows, emails or tele survey etc). The product and service quality will be the same no matter whether you take part in this program or not. "

2. The below information will be sent to us if you choose to participate in this program:" System information: Hardware and system platform data etc; Product application: Most frequently used application, Most popular features etc; Error and collapse data: Error description and frequency etc. The User Experience Improvement Program will only collect information related to Gionee products and services. But because some software might influence the Gionee product and service applications (e.g. software clash, safety leak etc ), we might collect the information of these software as well. We respect your privacy. For more information, please refer our privacy policy. To remind you, you may incur data charges as data delivers to our server. Please be aware that we must stay in control of the cellular data cost. "
3. This program is completely anonymous." We will not collect any notable personal data. The data we collect is anonymous and it will only be in used by our product team. "

4. This program is completely voluntary." You can choose whether to participate or not when you register. Also, you can take part in or leave the program any time as you wish. How to Change Settings: Go to Gionee Service or Member Center, select After Sales Service, click on the Menu button or Setting button, and turn on/off the User Experience Improvement Program If you would not like to participate in this program or it is in violation of your company or organization’s strategy, please do not take part in this program. "

Privacy strategy" Gionee Communication Equipment Ltd concentrate on the protection of user privacy. The aim of this privacy strategy is to state that we might collect data when you visit or use Gionee mobile phone product and relative service, how would we use these data, whether will we share it to third party and your right of judging the application and revision of this information. "

Information that relative to you" We might require you to fill in mobile number or email address when you register; The data will mainly been applied in account management, such as password reminder and verification code receiving. Also, it might be applied in message notification , for instance, to tell you the release of product or service that you might be interested in. During the application, you might need to provide some specialized personal information , these data will be used by Gionee Communication Equipment Ltd to provide you relative service. For example, you might be required to provide your city information, so that the browser could provide relative weather prediction and so on. The data that has been collected will not relative to your personal issue. Rather than the information you provide when you connect the server, we will only collect information relative to product and service. But because some software might influence the application of Gionee product and service (For example software clash, safety leak etc ). We might collect the information of these software . These information will only be collected under your authorization. "

Reveal and Open recourse" We will not share your personal information to any third party person or organization when you use Gionee service, such as name, address, email address and mobile phone number. At the same time, as the above stated, we might share the statistical result with our cooperation partner.
"The change of Gionee Communication Equipment Ltd strategy of privacy" If we need to change the strategy of privacy, relative change with be shown in this page for your notification of what information will we collect, how would we use it and whether to share with third party."

Media player will show on your PC when its version is Windows vista or higher.

"Do as following:
1.Install tools for the first time: sudo apt-get install mtpfs libfuse-dev libmad0-dev
2.Create mount point: sudo mkdir /media/mtp
3.Modify permission: sudo chmod 775 /media/mtp
4.Mount MTP device: sudo mtpfs -o allow_other /media/mtp Then you can access files in file broswer, or transport file by command, such as: cp abc.mp4 /media/mtp/Movies/
5.Umount device: sudo umount /media/mtp"

Just touch the fingerprint sensor to unlock your phone, authorize purchases, or sign in to apps. Be careful whose fingerprints you add - any fingerprints added will be able to do these things.
Note: Your fingerprint may be less secure than a strong pattern or PIN.
Locate the fingerprint sensor at the front bottom of your phone.
Illustration with device and fingerprint sensor location
Put your finger on the sensor and lift after you feel a vibration
Great! Now repeat the action again
Move your finger slightly to add all the different parts of your fingerprint
Whenever you see this icon, you can use your fingerprint for identification or to authorize a purchase.
Just touch the fingerprint sensor to wake and unlock your device.
When you see this icon, you can use your fingerprint.
Use the fingerprint sensor on your device.
In addition to unlocking your phone, you can also use your fingerprint to authorize purchases and app access. Learn more
Screen lock option disabled. You can still use your fingerprint to authorize purchases and app access.
Lift your finger, then touch the sensor again
You can add up to %d fingerprints
Do you want to remove all fingerprints?
"You won't be able to use your fingerprints to unlock your phone, authorize purchases, or sign in to apps with them."

"You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded apps and their data, media, and other files. After you encrypt your phone, assuming you’ve set up a screen lock (that is, a pattern or numeric PIN or password), you’ll need to unlock the screen to decrypt the phone every time you turn it on. The only other way to decrypt is to perform a factory data reset, erasing all your data.
Encryption takes an hour or more. You must start with a charged battery and keep your phone plugged in throughout the process. If you interrupt it, you’ll lose some or all of your data."
Charge your battery and try again.
Plug in your charger and try again.
No lock screen PIN or mixed password
You need to set a lock screen PIN or mixed password before you can start encryption.
Are you sure you want to encrypt?
The encryption operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you’ll lose data. Encryption takes an hour or more, during which the phone will restart several times.
Wait while your phone is being encrypted. ^1% complete.
Wait while your phone is being encrypted. Time remaining: ^1
To unlock your phone, turn it off and then on.
Warning: Your device will be wiped out after ^1 more failed attempts to be unlocked!

"Encryption was interrupted and can’t complete. As a result, the data on your phone is no longer accessible.
To resume using your phone, you need to perform a factory reset. When you set up your phone after the reset, you’ll have an opportunity to restore any data that was backed up to your Google Account."

"The password you entered is correct, but unfortunately your data is corrupt.

"When this feature is turned on, you can zoom in and out by triple-tapping the screen.
While zoomed in, you can: "
"Pan: Drag two or more fingers across the screen. "
Adjust zoom level: Pinch two or more fingers together or spread them apart."
You can also temporarily magnify what’s under your finger by triple-tapping and holding. In this magnified state, you can drag your finger to explore different parts of the screen. Lift your finger to return to your previous state.
Note: Triple-tap for magnification works everywhere except the keyboard and navigation bar."

"When this feature is turned on, you can quickly enable accessibility features in two steps:
Step 1: Press and hold the power button until you hear a sound or feel a vibration.
Step 2: Touch and hold two fingers until you hear audio confirmation.
If the device has multiple users, using this shortcut on the lock screen temporarily enables accessibility until the device is unlocked."

"You can further protect this device by requiring your PIN before it starts up. Until the device starts up, it can’t receive calls, messages, or notifications, including alarms.
